name: Autocraft
description:
IDLE GAME


An idle game is a game where you play by "not playing"... the way the game works.. is that you let your character farming resources.
and leveling up.. and then you buy the upgrades.

Why make this?


Idle games are very small games wich allows you learn how to play the game quickly..
Many players enjoy this format of gaming. wich allows them to work or watch tv while playing.



Autocraft is a game where you will be playing as a mighty champion that can collect loot.. as well as enchant his shield with bonus gems found around.

Btw this is like my previous games! If you liked them go ahead!! If you didnt please skip!



  • Shield socketing
  • Gear looting
  • Jewels purchases
  • Auto-Battle
  • Study new skills
  • Buy some pots
